analysis.key_quote: Having non-partisan civil servants to SERVE the PEOPLE is a founding pillar of our country and constitution. NO PRESIDENT should be able to take that away from the people. That is unconstitutional and unethical.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reclassification of employees under Schedule F, emphasizing the importance of non-partisan civil service and raising constitutional and ethical concerns, which aligns with the themes of merit-based system and politicization.
